description._content: Author: Tolman, Ruel P (Ruel Pardee) b. 1878 Subject: National Museum of Natural History (U.S.) Type: Photographic print     Person, candid Date: 1936 Topic: Uniforms      Men Standard number: SIA2012-1053 and 32906-20 Physical description: Number of Images: 1; Color: Black and white; Size: 2.13w x 2.13h; Type of Image: Person, candid; Medium: Photographic print Category: Historic Images of the Smithsonian Notes: The image is included in Tolman's scrapbook of photographs of Smithsonian staff, grounds and buildings, exhibitions, and Washington, D.C. scenes, (Section R) Summary: Image of a man identified as Railey standing outside the National Museum of Natural History, in a wooden shed. The man is wearing a guard's uniform Persistent URL:Link to data base record Repository:Smithsonian Archives - History Div View more collections from the Smithsonian Institution.
